alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 04 at 8:09PM EDT until June 05 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM EDT SUNDAY THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Strong north to south longshore current along the east facing beaches. There is also a Moderate Risk of rip currents expected along all area beaches. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Coastal Horry and Coastal Georgetown Counties. In North Carolina, Coastal Pender and Coastal New Hanover Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM EDT Sunday through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Longshore currents can sweep swimmers and surfers into rip currents, piers, jetties, and other hazardous areas. It may sweep swimmers off their feet, making it difficult to return to shore.
info.instruction: Caution should be used when in or near the water. Check with lifeguards before entering the ocean for possible hazards you may be swept into.
